description: Predict whether a snp is causal simultaneously in 49 tissues. A snp is postive in a tissue, only if its pip in that tissue exceeds a cutoff.
construction_info: Move into /source and run download_gtex_v8_finemapping_dapg.sh and download_exons_gtf.sh, then run python3 by_tissue.py there; move back to the root folder and run main.py.
